settings.heading: The Oodie Story
settings.content: Back in 2018, Davie Fogarty, had an idea to make Aussies happier than a kangaroo on a trampoline. He birthed the Oodie™ Original – a heavenly blend of a cosy blanket and wearable awesomeness. With a hood big enough to hide your face from your boss and a pocket that can hold more snacks than your stomach can handle, The Oodie™ Original is your BFF for movie nights, snuggles, and gaming marathons. Prepare to feelcomfy,cosy, and downright scrumptious!

settings.heading: A World Of Comfort
settings.content: We're the top rated wearable blanket company in the world, but we don't stop there! We've got Sleep Tees, Robes, Pyjamas, Slippers, and more on the way. Our Comfort Consultants search high and low for the cuddliest, softest fabrics you'll ever wear. Get ready for years of Oodiecuddles!

settings.title: Global Snuggle Squad
settings.content: We're like the cool kids in school, working with the big-name brands like Disney, Warner Brothers, Marvel, DC Comics, AFL, NRL and more! We've got a knack for making cosy stuff that these legends can't resist. Stick with us, and you'll be cuddled up in some seriously awesome gear.
